name: The Outer Space Bugs
description:
The Outer Space Bugs is a space survival game. You will find yourself alone in lunar ground, and will find out that there are some not friendly residents. You will have to survive to waves of monsters with weird appearances. Level Up killing monsters and survive as long as you can, until the Space Station help you with new resources.

RESOURCES, ETC...


-Dozens of different monsters
-Different weapons
-Challenging Bosses
-Items that helps the gameplay

--------SURVIVE AS MUCH AS YOU CAN---------
